body: Bankelele announces the launch of The 2011 Diageo Africa Business Reporting Awards - DABRA in Nairobi, Kenya. Entries are invited from all African countries for the winners to be announced in London later this year.
original_body: Bankelele announces the launch of The 2011 Diageo Africa Business Reporting Awards - DABRA in Nairobi, Kenya. Entries are invited from all African countries for the winners to be announced in London later this year.
title: Africa: The 2011 Diageo Africa Business Reporting Awards

sentence: Bankelele announces the launch of The 2011 Diageo Africa Business Reporting Awards - DABRA in Nairobi, Kenya.
Entries are invited from all African countries for the winners to be announced in London later this year.
